sentences.sentence: A little oblong packet, enveloped in blue paper, fell from one of the pockets of the greatcoat.
sentences.translation: 一个长方形蓝纸包从那厚大衣的一只衣袋里掉了出来。

sentences.sentence: Imes removed his greatcoat from the cloakroom.
sentences.translation: 艾姆斯从衣帽间取出他的大衣。

sentences.sentence: He said opening his greatcoat which he held bundled up in his arms.
sentences.translation: 他说，打开他的大衣，这件大衣是被他裹成一团抱在怀里的。
